name: Adrift (tabby)
description:
A 3D environment about  the last day of a lone sailor's journey to break a family curse. A uni project <3. 

Credits & Details

Although I made most of the assets and script, a handful of third party assets and SFX are included! Especially appreciative for the opensource project Crest Ocean System! A fantastic shader.

Full-length attribution listed in full in the READ ME file (pdf).
